name: ExpressibleByUnicodeScalarLiteral
desc: A type that can be initialized with a string literal containing a single Unicode scalar value.

items.name: associatedtype UnicodeScalarLiteralType
items.desc: A type that represents a Unicode scalar literal.

items.name: init(unicodeScalarLiteral: Self.UnicodeScalarLiteralType)
items.desc: Creates an instance initialized to the given value.
